pageContext.claim: “Baltimore will turn around, and I will help. Crime will go way down, money and jobs will pour in. Life will be MUCH better because Kimberly really cares. The Dems have had 100 years and they gave you nothing but heartache. Baltimore is the WORST IN NATION, Kimberly will fix it, and fast. The current recipient has no chance, and won't even try. As I have often said, Baltimore is last in everything, WHAT THE HELL DO YOU HAVE TO LOSE! Kimberly is fully Endorsed by me, something I do not do lightly. Take advantage of it and MAKE BALTIMORE GREAT!”
pageContext.analysis: Maryland's seventh district, where Kimberly Klacik was the Republican candidate, includes rural and suburban parts of Baltimore and Howard counties, as well as parts of Baltimore city. These include some of the lowest crime and highest-income ZIP codes in the country. Trump doesn't clarify at what Baltimore is "worst in nation," but in recent years, the city's crime rates have declined and the economy has picked up.
